articles.title: JANET STREET-PORTER: 'Marriage' has dragged the BBC's dreary dramas to a depressing new low - Daily Mail
articles.description: JANET STREET-PORTER: There is one reason why I expect Marriage - the BBC TV series - to be a flop: no one wants to be reminded just how humdrum their lives are.
articles.content:
Do we need a television series to remind us how dreary living with the same person for 27 years can be? Even if the leading man is Sean Bean, an actor whos been married even more times than me.
